languages.text: Лифтовая система, ведущая в глубинные секции гробницы, установлена уже давно, и на каждом болте оттиснут герб вашей династии.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Лифт, сооруженный для доступа в углубленные секции гробницы, как сверху, так и снизу.

languages.text: The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.
languages.original_text: Лифтовая система, ведущая в глубинные секции гробницы, установлена уже давно, и на каждом болте оттиснут герб вашей династии.

traits.locale_text: The elevator system leading into the deeper sections of the crypt had been running for a long time, and every bolt has your dynasty' coat of arms imprinted on it.
The elevator system leading into the deeper sections of the crypt had been running for a long time, and every bolt has your dynasty' coat of arms imprinted on it.
The elevator system leading into the deeper sections of the crypt has been running for a long time and every bolt has your dynasty' coat of arms imprinted on it.
The elevator system leading into the deeper sections of the crypt has been running for a long time and every bolt has your dynasty' coat of arms imprinted on it.
The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.
The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.

languages.text: L'ascenseur qui mène dans les profondeurs de la crypte semble avoir été installé il y a très longtemps. Chacun de ses boulons porte les armoiries de votre dynastie.
languages.original_text: The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.

traits.locale_text: L'ascenseur qui mène dans les profondeurs de la crypte est en fonctionnement depuis longtemps. Chacun de ses boulons porte les armoiries de votre dynastie.

languages.text: El sistema de ascensores que conduce a las secciones más profundas de la cripta se instaló hace mucho tiempo. Cada uno de sus tornillos lleva estampado el escudo de armas de tu dinastía.
languages.original_text: The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.

traits.locale_text: El sistema de ascensores que conduce a las secciones más profundas de la cripta lleva mucho tiempo funcionando y cada uno de sus tornillos presenta el escudo de armas de tu dinastía.

languages.text: 电梯系统是很久以前安装好的，通往地窖深处，每个螺栓上都印着你的王朝徽记。
languages.original_text: The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.

traits.locale_text: 这个电梯系统通往地窖深处，已经运行了很长时间，每个螺栓上都印着你的王朝徽记。

languages.text: 墓所の奥深くへと通じるエレベーターは、長期にわたって稼働しているもののようだ。そしてそのボルトのひとつひとつに、あなたの王朝の紋章が刻まれている。
languages.original_text: The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.

traits.locale_text: 墓所の奥深くへと通じるエレベーターは、長期にわたって稼働しているもののようだ。そしてそのボルトのひとつひとつに、あなたの王朝の紋章が刻まれている。

languages.text: Das Aufzugssystem, das in die tieferen Abschnitte der Krypta führt, wurde offenbar vor sehr langer Zeit installiert. Auf jedem Bolzen prangt das Wappen deiner Dynastie.
languages.original_text: The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.

traits.locale_text: Das Aufzugssystem, das in die tieferen Abschnitte der Krypta führt, läuft seit sehr langer Zeit. Auf jedem Bolzen prangt das Wappen deiner Dynastie.

languages.text: Mahzenin derin bölümlerine giden asansör sistemi, uzun zaman önce inşa edilmişe benziyor. Her bir bulon, hanedanlığının armasıyla mühürlenmiş.
languages.original_text: The elevator system leading to the deeper sections of the crypt was installed a long time ago, it seems. Every bolt is stamped with your dynastic coat of arms.
